results.text: That's not how any of this works One randomly determine spell effect that affect you directly is transferred to the target for the remainder of it's duration.

That's not even in the Game Anymore! Antimagic field. Magical equipment, spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities don't function for you for 1d4 rounds. You are still subject to magic attacks.
Worse than Nothing You are subjected to the targeted dispel effect of dispel magic (Core Rulebook 351); this has a 50% chance to succeed rather than using a caster level check.
How did that Even Happen? you create the effect from a randomly determined spell you know of the same or lower spell level on a randomly determined target within 30 feet.
Spontaneous Combustion You gain the burning condition (1d6 damage per spell level).
That did not help Your target gains a +1 enhancement bonus to attacks and AC for 1d4 rounds.
Ectoplasmic Residue You are entangled, as per the entangle weapon special property.
Magic Mayhem You take a -2 penalty to saves against spells for 2d4 rounds.
Magic is Mysterious Roll d% for the effect of a wonder grenade (Starfinder Armory 127) in a 20-foot radius centered on you.
Admixed Accident You take weapon damage of a randomly determined energy type.
Monster Rift The spell summons a randomly determined creature from a summon creature spell (Alien Archive 144) of the same spell level. this creature attacks you.
Lost in Space You teleport 4d6 squares in a randomly determined direction, and your turn ends.
Worst-Case Scenario All your target's weapons gain the vorpal weapon fusion (Core Rulebook 195) for 1d4 rounds.
Has Your Name On It All your target's weapons gain the bane weapon fusion (Core Rulebook 192) against your creature type for 2d4 rounds.
Anti-Me Spell Your target gains a +2 bonus to its AC and saving throws against your attacks for 2d4 rounds.
Wait? What? You are confused for 1 round.
What Have I Done?! You are staggered for 1 round.
The Eldritch Fates don't like you Reroll the attack against the ally closest to you target, if the attack could normally target that ally.
That took a lot out of you You take a -1 penalty to your spell DC's for 1d4 rounds.
It's Stuck in My Face! Spell energy clings to you, causing all attackers to treat you as flanked for 1d6 rounds.
That'll leave a Mark You gain vulnerability to the spell's damage type for 1d3 rounds.
Caster's Block You can't cast this spell for 24 hours.
Now you're thinking with Elf Gates You and the target switch places. Your turn ends and you are prone and flat-footed for 1 round.
We need a Bigger Challenge Your target gains a DR 5/- and resistance 5 against all energy types for 1d4 rounds.
Not Me, You Fools! For the next 10 minutes, you are subjected to any conjuration spell you have active that can be directed against targets, as if you were the spell's target.
Stars in your Eyes You are dazzled for 1 hour.
Why Me? For 2d4 rounds, any attack that misses a target adjacent to you is rerolled against you.
Destined to be a Meme on the Infosphere Your spell targets or is centered on you (allowing saving throws as normal).
Retributive Strike You take 1d6 damage per level of the spell.
Don't Pick At It! You gain the bleeding condition (1d4 damage per spell level).
The Power to Cloud Minds The target is invisible to you for 1d4 rounds.
Thick as Molasses You are subjected to a slow spell for 2d4 rounds.
Worse Than Useless You lose a randomly determined additional spell slot or daily use of a spell-like ability of the same or higher spell level.
Where'd Everyone Go? You are blinded for 1 round.
The Spirits Say They Don't Like You Reroll the attack against the most distant possible target within the spell's range.
Curses! You are the target of a randomly determined bestow curse spell (Will negates).
Those Microbes Got In The Way Your target gains the benefits of a greater remove condition spell (Core Rulebook 373).
Shot 'Em in the Battery Your target gains the benefits of a recharge spell (Core Rulebook 372).
Two Left Appendages You take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves for 2d4 rounds.
System Crash You take a -2 penalty to Fortitude saves for 2d4 rounds.
Weak-Willed Fool! You take a -2 penalty to Will saves for 2d4 rounds.
Can't Win for Losing You fail the next saving throw you attempt within 2d4 minutes.
Noisome and Disquieting You move 2 steps down the Intelligence poison track (Core Rulebook 416) for 1d4 minutes.
Is that my Inside Voice? Your target gains information from you as if they had cast detect thoughts against you for 3 rounds (Will negates; Core Rulebook 349).
Transformed Into a Doughnut One randomly determined item on your person is unusable and has a hardness 0 for 5d4 rounds.
Honey, I Duplicated The Foes Your target gains the benefits of a displacement spell for 1d4 rounds (Core Rulebook 352).
Ugly Mistake You move 2 steps down the Charisma poison track (Core Rulebook 417) for 1d4 minutes.
Clatto Verata Necktie You move 2 steps down the Wisdom poison track (Core Rulebook 416) for 1d4 minutes.
Painful Miscasting You are subjected to an inflict pain spell for 1d4 rounds (Will negates; Core Rulebook 361).
Side Effect Your target gains the benefits of a nondetection spell (Core Rulebook 367).
Boomerang Boom Your target gains the benefits of a reflecting armor spell (core Rulebook 372).
It's Coming Through Now Your target gains the benefits of a supercharge weapon spell (Core Rulebook 379).
Universal Mistranslator You can't communicate in or understand any language for 1d4 minutes.
